title: Bloke's chilli
ingredients: ['1lb/450g minced beef', '1 large onion, chopped', '1 clove of garlic, finely chopped (optional)', '1 400g can of chopped tomatoes', '1 400g can red kidney beans', '1 400g can baked beans', '2 heaped teaspoons chilli powder', 'a pinch of paprika', 'a pinch of cayenne', 'half tsp salt', 'bay leaf - a vital ingredient', 'spaghetti or other pasta', '1 tblspoon of oil for cooking']
